Description: On US-460 in the County of Prince George, in the vicinity of Queen St; Rt. 618N/S (Prince George County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 74 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed. The south exit 74A narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 86 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 164.8 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 8.2 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
